ISSUE.TITLE: Layout Shift on Supabase homepage Login Button gets annoying
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Bug report ## Describe the bug Not so much a bug but an improvement request: When you're already logged in to supabase, if you head to supabase.com you'll get a flash of unauthenticated content for about 1s (In Australia at least) which is just enough time to click on the "Login" problem is, this often is the perfect time for it to switch to authenticated and you accidentally click on the "Star us on GitHub" button Nice feature to get more stars, but super annoying otherwise. Annoying enough for me to open a bug report ## To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior, please provide code snippets or a repository: 1. Go to supabase.com 2. Click on login 3. Sucked in you hit the GitHub link by accident 4. ... 5. Swearing practice ## Expected behavior Just move the auth'd interface to align with the un-authed interface so buttons don't move ## Screenshots NA ## System information any browser
